00035 #include "MultiplyQualityMetric.hpp"
00036 #include "Vector3D.hpp"
00037 #include "Matrix3D.hpp"
00038 #include "MsqError.hpp"

00040 using namespace Mesquite;
00041 
00042 MultiplyQualityMetric::MultiplyQualityMetric(QualityMetric* qm1, QualityMetric* qm2, MsqError &err)
00043   : metric1(*qm1), metric2(*qm2)
00044 {
00045   if (qm1->get_metric_type() != qm2->get_metric_type() ||
00046       qm1->get_negate_flag() != qm2->get_negate_flag())
00047   {
00048     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Incompatible metrics", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00049   }
00050 }
00051 
00052 MultiplyQualityMetric::~MultiplyQualityMetric() {}
00053 
00054 QualityMetric::MetricType MultiplyQualityMetric::get_metric_type() const
00055 {
00056   return metric1.get_metric_type();
00057 }
00058 
00059 std::string MultiplyQualityMetric::get_name() const
00060 {
00061   return metric1.get_name() + "*" + metric2.get_name();
00062 }
00063 
00064 int MultiplyQualityMetric::get_negate_flag() const
00065 {
00066   return metric1.get_negate_flag();
00067 }
00068 
00069 void MultiplyQualityMetric::get_evaluations( PatchData& pd,
00070                                         std::vector<size_t>& handles,
00071                                         bool free_only,
00072                                         MsqError& err )
00073 {
00074   metric1.get_evaluations( pd, handles, free_only, err );
00075   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00076   metric2.get_evaluations( pd, mHandles, free_only, err );
00077   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00078   if (handles != mHandles) {
00079     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Incompatible metrics", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00080   }
00081 }
00082 
00083 bool MultiplyQualityMetric::evaluate( PatchData& pd,
00084                                  size_t handle,
00085                                  double& value,
00086                                  MsqError& err )
00087 {
00088   double val1, val2;
00089   bool rval1, rval2;
00090   rval1 = metric1.evaluate( pd, handle, val1, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00091   rval2 = metric2.evaluate( pd, handle, val2, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00092   value = val1 * val2;
00093   return rval1 && rval2;
00094 }
00095 
00096 bool MultiplyQualityMetric::evaluate_with_indices( PatchData& pd,
00097                                               size_t handle,
00098                                               double& value,
00099                                               std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00100                                               MsqError& err )
00101 {
00102   double val1, val2;
00103   bool rval1, rval2;
00104   rval1 = metric1.evaluate_with_indices( pd, handle, val1, indices1, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00105   rval2 = metric2.evaluate_with_indices( pd, handle, val2, indices2, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00106   
00107   indices.clear();
00108   std::sort( indices1.begin(), indices1.end() );
00109   std::sort( indices2.begin(), indices2.end() );
00110   std::set_union( indices1.begin(), indices1.end(),
00111                   indices2.begin(), indices2.end(),
00112                   std::back_inserter( indices ) );
00113   
00114   value = val1 * val2;
00115   return rval1 && rval2;
00116 }
00117 
00118 bool MultiplyQualityMetric::evaluate_with_gradient( PatchData& pd,
00119                                                size_t handle,
00120                                                double& value,
00121                                                std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00122                                                std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient,
00123                                                MsqError& err )
00124 {
00125   std::vector<size_t>::iterator i;
00126   size_t j;
00127   double val1, val2;
00128   bool rval1, rval2;
00129   rval1 = metric1.evaluate_with_gradient( pd, handle, val1, indices1, grad1, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00130   rval2 = metric2.evaluate_with_gradient( pd, handle, val2, indices2, grad2, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00131   
00132   indices.resize( indices1.size() + indices2.size() );
00133   i = std::copy( indices1.begin(), indices1.end(), indices.begin() );
00134   std::copy( indices2.begin(), indices2.end(), i );
00135   std::sort( indices.begin(), indices.end() );
00136   indices.erase( std::unique( indices.begin(), indices.end() ), indices.end() );
00137   
00138   gradient.clear();
00139   gradient.resize( indices.size(), Vector3D(0.0) );
00140   for (j = 0; j < indices1.size(); ++j)
00141   {
00142     i = std::lower_bound( indices.begin(), indices.end(), indices1[j] );
00143     size_t k = i - indices.begin();
00144     gradient[k] += val2 * grad1[j];
00145   }
00146   for (j = 0; j < indices2.size(); ++j)
00147   {
00148     i = std::lower_bound( indices.begin(), indices.end(), indices2[j] );
00149     size_t k = i - indices.begin();
00150     gradient[k] += val1 * grad2[j];
00151   }
00152   
00153   value = val1 * val2;
00154   return rval1 && rval2;
00155 }
00156 
00157 bool MultiplyQualityMetric::evaluate_with_Hessian( PatchData& pd,
00158                                               size_t handle,
00159                                               double& value,
00160                                               std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00161                                               std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient,
00162                                               std::vector<Matrix3D>& Hessian,
00163                                               MsqError& err )
00164 {
00165   std::vector<size_t>::iterator i;
00166   size_t j, r, c, n, h;
00167   double val1, val2;
00168   bool rval1, rval2;
00169   rval1 = metric1.evaluate_with_Hessian( pd, handle, val1, indices1, grad1, Hess1, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00170   rval2 = metric2.evaluate_with_Hessian( pd, handle, val2, indices2, grad2, Hess2, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00171     // merge index lists
00172   indices.resize( indices1.size() + indices2.size() );
00173   i = std::copy( indices1.begin(), indices1.end(), indices.begin() );
00174   std::copy( indices2.begin(), indices2.end(), i );
00175   std::sort( indices.begin(), indices.end() );
00176   indices.erase( std::unique( indices.begin(), indices.end() ), indices.end() );
00177     // calculate grads and convert index lists to indices into output list
00178   gradient.clear();
00179   gradient.resize( indices.size(), Vector3D(0.0) );
00180   for (j = 0; j < indices1.size(); ++j)
00181   {
00182     i = std::lower_bound( indices.begin(), indices.end(), indices1[j] );
00183     indices1[j] = i - indices.begin();
00184     gradient[indices1[j]] += val2 * grad1[j];
00185   }
00186   for (j = 0; j < indices2.size(); ++j)
00187   {
00188     i = std::lower_bound( indices.begin(), indices.end(), indices2[j] );
00189     indices2[j] = i - indices.begin();
00190     gradient[indices2[j]] += val1 * grad2[j];
00191   }
00192     // allocate space for hessians, and zero it
00193   const size_t N = indices.size();
00194   Hessian.clear();
00195   Hessian.resize( N * (N+1) / 2, Matrix3D(0.0) );
00196     // add hessian terms from first metric
00197   n = indices1.size();
00198   h = 0; 
00199   for (r = 0; r < n; ++r) 
00200   {
00201     const size_t nr = indices1[r];
00202     for (c = r; c < n; ++c)
00203     {
00204       const size_t nc = indices1[c];
00205       Hess1[h] *= val2;
00206       if (nr <= nc)
00207         Hessian[N*nr - nr*(nr+1)/2 + nc] += Hess1[h];
00208       else
00209         Hessian[N*nc - nc*(nc+1)/2 + nr].plus_transpose_equal( Hess1[h] );
00210       ++h;
00211     }
00212   }
00213     // add hessian terms from second metric
00214   n = indices2.size();
00215   h = 0; 
00216   for (r = 0; r < n; ++r) 
00217   {
00218     const size_t nr = indices2[r];
00219     for (c = r; c < n; ++c)
00220     {
00221       const size_t nc = indices2[c];
00222       Hess2[h] *= val1;
00223       if (nr <= nc)
00224         Hessian[N*nr - nr*(nr+1)/2 + nc] += Hess2[h];
00225       else
00226         Hessian[N*nc - nc*(nc+1)/2 + nr].plus_transpose_equal( Hess2[h] );
00227       ++h;
00228     }
00229   }
00230     // add gradient outer products
00231   n = indices1.size();
00232   size_t m = indices2.size();
00233   Matrix3D outer;
00234   for (r = 0; r < n; ++r)
00235   {
00236     const size_t nr = indices1[r];
00237     for (c = 0; c < m; ++c)
00238     {
00239       const size_t nc = indices2[c];
00240       outer.outer_product( grad1[r], grad2[c] );
00241       if (nr == nc) 
00242         Hessian[N*nr - nr*(nr+1)/2 + nc] += outer.plus_transpose_equal(outer);
00243       else if (nr < nc)
00244         Hessian[N*nr - nr*(nr+1)/2 + nc] += outer;
00245       else
00246         Hessian[N*nc - nc*(nc+1)/2 + nr].plus_transpose_equal(outer);
00247     }
00248   }
00249   
00250   value = val1 * val2;
00251   return rval1 && rval2;
00252 }
